Content: Desktop and Android This is the best app for planning I have found. Never crashes, syncs across all devices perfectly and is constantly updated by the author. I use it for software design, projects and anything that requires planning. One of the few I would unconditionally recommend as a professional engineer.

Worth it
My phone started crashing randomly around the time I downloaded this app. I have tried uninstalling every other app I installed around the time of this one to rule them out but still have crashes. I suspect this app but I love it so much (and don't want to lose the maps I've created) that I'm living with the crashes for it! My galaxy s2 is getting pretty old I guess...
amazing easy to use, saves automatically, doesnt crash, had it for 6 months and it hasnt forced closed yet
Great! Does exactly what it says on the tin, just wish you could control the colours/style a bit more, but its great, it doesnt crash, i have never lost work or ever had any problem with it :)

Fantastic Such an easy app to use. Constantly saving so if there any crashes (none so far) then your work is safe. Using this on my Galaxy Tablet is a joy. I'm able to drag an individual box around or a selection if I choose. Highly recommended.
Simple but very useful This is an easy way to draw a mind map. You can go back and add notes, or move and regroup the thought balloons. Highly recommend. Not experienced any bugs or crashes.
